uni.hamburg.yamms.solver
Class DormandPrinceSolver

java.lang.Object
  uni.hamburg.yamms.solver.Solver
      uni.hamburg.yamms.solver.AdaptiveStepsizeSolver
          uni.hamburg.yamms.solver.DormandPrinceSolver

public class DormandPrinceSolver
extends AdaptiveStepsizeSolver

Uses the Apache common maths implementation of the Dormand Prince 54 integrator (4th order, 5th order correction).

Author:
Claas Abert

addInterpolatedHandler

public void addInterpolatedHandler(StepHandler handler,
                                   double interval)
Description copied from class: AdaptiveStepsizeSolver
Adds a step handler to the integrator that is called every interval time (the integration time). The state passed to the handler is interpolated if necessary.

Specified by:
addInterpolatedHandler in class AdaptiveStepsizeSolver
Parameters:
handler - the step handler
interval - the call interval
